title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: 2016 Cryptocracy Series 1 set and Series 2 coinSeries 1 came as a 3 coin set that had the serialized holograms already attachedThere were 100 of each finish made and each coin is numbered out of 2^160(2^160 is the number of possible bitcoin addresses)Series 2 came as a single DIY coin and a non-serialized, new larger V2 hologramThere were 100 coins produced and came numbered.Original threads:Series 1: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1547698Series 2: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1637320STARTING BID: 0.0050BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: JULY 18th, 2022, 13:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending timeIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: I have a series 2 but need series 1 .0052 BTC
